# source-linkage-files

[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/Public-Health-Scotland/source-linkage-files/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/Public-Health-Scotland/source-linkage-files/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml)
[![Codecov test
coverage](https://codecov.io/gh/Public-Health-Scotland/source-linkage-files/branch/master/graph/badge.svg)](https://app.codecov.io/gh/Public-Health-Scotland/source-linkage-files?branch=master)

The Source Linkage Files (SLF) are a linked dataset maintained by the
Health and Social Care (H&SC) team at Public Health Scotland (PHS). This
repo contains the R code to develop the package called `createslf` which
is used for the production and maintenance of the SLFs. The entire
process is contained within this git repository.

The SLFs are updated on a quarterly basis with updates taking place in
March, June, September and December. If you are using the files and spot
a problem, please let us know and we will work closely with you to fix
this. Alternatively, if you would like to see a new feature on the SLFs,
please get in touch and we can look into your request.

## Access

Access to the Source Linkage Files is only available to approved users
in the Local Intelligence Support Team (LIST), Health and Social Care
(H&SC) and Whole System Modelling (WSM) teams within PHS. For anyone
interested in using the SLFs outside of these teams, please contact the
source mailbox to discuss this.

## Documentation

Documentation for the SLFs is available upon request. We have further
information available relating to our standard operating
procedures(SOP), reference document, episode file layout, individual
file layout and FAQs. If you are interested in accessing our
documentation, please contact the source mailbox for more information.

## Questions

If you have a SLF question, please get in touch either by email or
through Microsoft Teams on the [Source Linkage File
Team](https://teams.microsoft.com/l/team/19%3a94a97159a3c44358b2244ee450d4fc27%40thread.tacv2/conversations?groupId=c7901246-d78a-48a7-b8bb-2300aae094f3&tenantId=10efe0bd-a030-4bca-809c-b5e6745e499a)

## Slfhelper

We recommend using the package
[slfhelper](https://github.com/Public-Health-Scotland/slfhelper) to
access the files. This is an R package created for reading the SLFs
efficiently. Please note that slfhelper will only work for those with
access to the PHS confi stats drive.

## Contact

For any queries, please contact the source mailbox:
<phs.source@phs.scot>

# Package index

## Connection to PHS database

Connection to PHS database

- [`phs_db_connection()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/phs_db_connection.md)
  : Open a connection to a PHS database

## Check

Checks within vectors

- [`is_missing()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/is_missing.md)
  : Check for NA or blank values in a character vector
- [`check_variables_exist()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/check_variables_exist.md)
  : Check variables exist in data
- [`check_year_valid()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/check_year_valid.md)
  : Check data exists for a year
- [`check_it_reference()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/check_it_reference.md)
  : Check that an IT reference looks valid

## Years & Dates

### Dates within Financial Year

Functions to compute the start, end and midpoint dates of a financial
year, and convert date types

- [`calculate_stay()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/calculate_stay.md)
  : Calculate total length of stay
- [`compute_mid_year_age()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/compute_mid_year_age.md)
  : Compute Age at Midpoint of Year
- [`convert_date_to_numeric()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/convert_date_to_numeric.md)
  : Convert a date type to the 'SLF numeric format'
- [`convert_numeric_to_date()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/convert_numeric_to_date.md)
  : Convert a date in 'SLF numeric format' to Date type
- [`end_fy()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/end_fy.md)
  : Return the end date of FY years
- [`end_fy_quarter()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/end_fy_quarter.md)
  : Return the end of a quarter
- [`end_next_fy_quarter()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/end_next_fy_quarter.md)
  : Return the end of the next quarter
- [`fy_interval()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/fy_interval.md)
  : Financial Year interval
- [`is_date_in_fyyear()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/is_date_in_fyyear.md)
  : Check if a date, or interval is in the financial year
- [`last_date_month()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/last_date_month.md)
  : Return the end date of the month of the given date
- [`midpoint_fy()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/midpoint_fy.md)
  : Return the date of the midpoint of the FY year
- [`next_fy()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/next_fy.md)
  : Return the next financial year
- [`start_fy()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/start_fy.md)
  : Return the start date of FY year
- [`start_fy_quarter()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/start_fy_quarter.md)
  : Return the start of a quarter
- [`start_next_fy_quarter()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/start_next_fy_quarter.md)
  : Return the start of the next quarter
- [`which_fy()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/which_fy.md)
  : which_fy Extract financial year from a date
- [`add_homelessness_date_flags()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/add_homelessness_date_flags.md)
  : Add homelessness date flags episode
- [`end_date()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/end_date.md)
  : End date
- [`fix_sc_end_dates()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/fix_sc_end_dates.md)
  : Fix sc end dates
- [`fix_sc_missing_end_dates()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/fix_sc_missing_end_dates.md)
  : Fix sc missing end dates
- [`fix_sc_start_dates()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/fix_sc_start_dates.md)
  : Fix sc start dates
- [`fy()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/fy.md)
  : Extract latest FY from end_date
- [`qtr()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/qtr.md)
  : Extract latest quarter from end_date

### Year Format

Functions to convert between financial year and calendar year, and check
that the year variable is in the correct format

- [`check_year_format()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/check_year_format.md)
  : Check that the year is in the correct format
- [`convert_fyyear_to_year()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/convert_fyyear_to_year.md)
  : Convert year types - Financial year form to the alternate form
- [`convert_year_to_fyyear()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/convert_year_to_fyyear.md)
  : Convert year types - Alternate year form to financial year form
- [`combine_extracts_tests_year()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/combine_extracts_tests_year.md)
  : Combine year specific extract tests into one xlsx file by financial
  year
- [`is_date_in_fyyear()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/is_date_in_fyyear.md)
  : Check if a date, or interval is in the financial year
- [`latest_cost_year()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/latest_cost_year.md)
  : The latest financial year for Cost uplift setting
- [`process_tests_cross_year()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/process_tests_cross_year.md)
  : Process cross year tests

### Ages

Functions to deal with ages of clients

- [`add_age_group()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/add_age_group.md)
  : add_age_group
- [`compute_mid_year_age()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/compute_mid_year_age.md)
  : Compute Age at Midpoint of Year

## Clean-Up

Clean up the data

- [`clean_up_ch()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/clean_up_ch.md)
  : Clean up CH
- [`clean_up_free_text()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/clean_up_free_text.md)
  : Clean up a free text string
- [`clean_up_gender()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/clean_up_gender.md)
  : Clean up gender column
- [`fill_ch_names()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/fill_ch_names.md)
  : Fix and fill care home name and postcodes
- [`ch_name_extract_keyword()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/ch_name_extract_keyword.md)
  : extract keyword in a care home name
- [`cascade_geographies()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/cascade_geographies.md)
  : Match dummy HSCP and LCA codes
- [`correct_demographics()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/correct_demographics.md)
  : Correct date of birth and ages of records

## Create

### ID

Functions to create ID variables

- [`create_person_id()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/create_person_id.md)
  : Create the Person ID variable
- [`replace_sc_id_with_latest()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/replace_sc_id_with_latest.md)
  : Replace sc id with the latest sc id
- [`select_linking_id()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/select_linking_id.md)
  : Select linking ID Set linking_id as anon_chi if available otherwise
  social_care_id with sending location.

### Costs

Functions to create costs variables and fix costs

- [`calculate_outpatient_costs()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/calculate_outpatient_costs.md)
  : Calculate cost for Outpatient records
- [`create_day_episode_costs()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/create_day_episode_costs.md)
  : Assign costs for single day episodes
- [`create_monthly_costs()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/create_monthly_costs.md)
  : Create Monthly Costs
- [`fix_c3_costs()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/fix_c3_costs.md)
  : Fix C3 Costs - Acute Extract

### Flags

Functions to create flag variables

- [`create_demog_test_flags()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/create_demog_test_flags.md)
  : Create demographic test flags
- [`create_hb_cost_test_flags()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/create_hb_cost_test_flags.md)
  : Create Health Board cost test flags
- [`create_hb_test_flags()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/create_hb_test_flags.md)
  : Create Health Board test flags
- [`create_hscp_test_flags()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/create_hscp_test_flags.md)
  : Create HSCP test flags
- [`create_lca_client_test_flags()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/create_lca_client_test_flags.md)
  : Create LCA test flags
- [`create_lca_test_flags()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/create_lca_test_flags.md)
  : Create LCA test flags
- [`create_sending_location_test_flags()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/create_sending_location_test_flags.md)
  : Create sending location test flags
- [`add_homelessness_date_flags()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/add_homelessness_date_flags.md)
  : Add homelessness date flags episode

### Monthly

Functions to convert monthly variables, beddays

- [`convert_monthly_rows_to_vars()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/convert_monthly_rows_to_vars.md)
  : Convert Monthly Rows to Variables
- [`create_monthly_beddays()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/create_monthly_beddays.md)
  : Create Monthly Beddays

## Codes

Convert various codes to alternate forms

- [`convert_ca_to_lca()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/convert_ca_to_lca.md)
  : Convert Council Areas into Local Council Authority Codes
- [`convert_hb_to_hbnames()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/convert_hb_to_hbnames.md)
  : Convert NHS Health Board Codes to Names
- [`convert_hscp_to_hscpnames()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/convert_hscp_to_hscpnames.md)
  : Convert HSCP Codes to Names
- [`convert_sc_sending_location_to_lca()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/convert_sc_sending_location_to_lca.md)
  : Convert Social Care Sending Location Codes into LCA Codes
- [`add_smrtype()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/add_smrtype.md)
  : Add smrtype variable based on record ID
- [`convert_eng_gpprac_to_dummy()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/convert_eng_gpprac_to_dummy.md)
  : Convert GP Practice Codes to a Dummy Code
- [`aggregate_by_chi()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/aggregate_by_chi.md)
  : Aggregate by CHI
- [`assign_d_cohort_mh()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/assign_demographic_cohorts.md)
  [`assign_d_cohort_frailty()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/assign_demographic_cohorts.md)
  [`assign_d_cohort_maternity()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/assign_demographic_cohorts.md)
  [`assign_d_cohort_high_cc()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/assign_demographic_cohorts.md)
  [`assign_d_cohort_medium_cc()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/assign_demographic_cohorts.md)
  [`assign_d_cohort_low_cc()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/assign_demographic_cohorts.md)
  [`assign_d_cohort_comm_living()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/assign_demographic_cohorts.md)
  [`assign_d_cohort_adult_major()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/assign_demographic_cohorts.md)
  [`assign_d_cohort_child_major()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/assign_demographic_cohorts.md)
  [`assign_d_cohort_eol()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/assign_demographic_cohorts.md)
  [`assign_d_cohort_substance()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/assign_demographic_cohorts.md)
  : Assign Mental Health cohort
- [`get_slf_chi_deaths_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_slf_chi_deaths_path.md)
  : SLF CHI Deaths File Path
- [`is_chi_in_file()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/is_chi_in_file.md)
  : Check if chi is in a file
- [`process_it_chi_deaths()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/process_it_chi_deaths.md)
  : Process the CHI deaths extract
- [`process_tests_it_chi_deaths()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/process_tests_it_chi_deaths.md)
  : Process CHI Deaths tests
- [`produce_it_chi_deaths_tests()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/produce_it_chi_deaths_tests.md)
  : CHI death tests
- [`read_it_chi_deaths()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/read_it_chi_deaths.md)
  : Read the CHI deaths extract
- [`remove_blank_chi()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/remove_blank_chi.md)
  : Remove blank CHI
- [`create_lca_client_test_flags()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/create_lca_client_test_flags.md)
  : Create LCA test flags
- [`create_lca_test_flags()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/create_lca_test_flags.md)
  : Create LCA test flags

## Writing data

Functions which mask the typical data write functions to add some nice
defaults and importantly fix file permissions.

- [`write_file()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/write_file.md)
  : Write a data to a file
- [`clean_temp_data()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/clean_temp_data.md)
  : Clean temp data from disk
- [`combine_multi_xlsx()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/combine_multi_xlsx.md)
  : Combine xlsx files into one xlsx file
- [`store_ep_file_vars()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/store_ep_file_vars.md)
  : Store the unneeded episode file variables
- [`load_ep_file_vars()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/load_ep_file_vars.md)
  : Load the unneeded episode file variables
- [`write_temp_data()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/write_temp_data.md)
  : Write a temp data to disk in parquet format for debugging purpose
- [`write_console_output()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/write_console_output.md)
  : Write Console Output to File

## Initialisation

Get the date of update, period, and extract number

- [`get_dd_period()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_dd_period.md)
  : Delayed Discharge period
- [`latest_cost_year()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/latest_cost_year.md)
  : The latest financial year for Cost uplift setting
- [`latest_update()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/latest_update.md)
  : Latest update
- [`previous_update()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/previous_update.md)
  : Previous update
- [`years_to_run()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/years_to_run.md)
  : The year list for slf to update
- [`add_fy_qtr_from_period()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/add_fy_qtr_from_period.md)
  : Add financial year from Social Care period Financial year format, eg
  2024
- [`gzip_files()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/gzip_files.md)
  : Compress CSV with gzip
- [`make_lowercase_ext()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/make_lowercase_ext.md)
  : Make file path extensions lower-case

## Files

### Directories

File Directories for SLF’s

- [`get_dev_dir()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_dev_dir.md)
  : SLF directory - sourcedev / Source_Linkage_File_Updates
- [`get_lookups_dir()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_lookups_dir.md)
  : Lookups Directory Path
- [`get_slf_dir()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_slf_dir.md)
  : SLF directory - hscdiip
- [`get_year_dir()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_year_dir.md)
  : Year Directory

### Paths

File Paths for SLF’s

- [`get_dd_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_dd_path.md)
  : Get the Delayed Discharges file path
- [`get_demographic_cohorts_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_demographic_cohorts_path.md)
  : Demographic cohorts lookup Path
- [`get_file_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_file_path.md)
  : Get and check and full file path
- [`get_homelessness_completeness_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_homelessness_completeness_path.md)
  : Homelessness Completeness lookup path
- [`get_ltcs_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_ltcs_path.md)
  : Long Term Conditions File Path
- [`get_nsu_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_nsu_path.md)
  : NSU File Path
- [`get_practice_details_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_practice_details_path.md)
  : Practice Details File Path
- [`get_readcode_lookup_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_readcode_lookup_path.md)
  : Get the full path to the SLF read code lookup
- [`get_service_use_cohorts_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_service_use_cohorts_path.md)
  : Service-use cohorts lookup Path
- [`get_sg_homelessness_pub_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_sg_homelessness_pub_path.md)
  : Homelessness Completeness SG publication figures
- [`get_gpprac_ref_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_gpprac_ref_path.md)
  : GP Practice Reference File Path (gpprac)
- [`get_locality_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_locality_path.md)
  : Locality File Path
- [`get_lookups_dir()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_lookups_dir.md)
  : Lookups Directory Path
- [`get_pop_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_pop_path.md)
  : Populations File Path for different types
- [`get_simd_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_simd_path.md)
  : SIMD File Path
- [`get_spd_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_spd_path.md)
  : Scottish Postcode Directory File Path
- [`get_uk_postcode_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_uk_postcode_path.md)
  : get uk postcode list file path
- [`get_ch_costs_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_ch_costs_path.md)
  : Care Home Costs File Path
- [`get_dn_costs_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_dn_costs_path.md)
  : District Nursing Costs File Path
- [`get_dn_raw_costs_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_dn_raw_costs_path.md)
  : Raw District Nursing Costs File Path
- [`get_gp_ooh_costs_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_gp_ooh_costs_path.md)
  : GP Out of Hours Costs File Path
- [`get_gp_ooh_raw_costs_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_gp_ooh_raw_costs_path.md)
  : Raw GP OoH Costs File Path
- [`get_hc_costs_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_hc_costs_path.md)
  : Full Home Care Costs File Path
- [`get_hc_raw_costs_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_hc_raw_costs_path.md)
  : Raw Home Care Costs File Path
- [`get_boxi_extract_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_boxi_extract_path.md)
  : Get BOXI extract
- [`get_hhg_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_hhg_path.md)
  : HHG Extract File Path
- [`get_it_deaths_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_it_deaths_path.md)
  : IT Deaths File Path
- [`get_it_ltc_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_it_ltc_path.md)
  : IT Long Term Conditions File Path
- [`get_it_prescribing_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_it_prescribing_path.md)
  : IT Prescribing File Path
- [`get_source_extract_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_source_extract_path.md)
  : Source Extract File Path
- [`get_sparra_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_sparra_path.md)
  : SPARRA Extract File Path
- [`get_sc_client_lookup_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_sc_client_lookup_path.md)
  : Social Care Client Lookup File Path
- [`get_sc_demog_lookup_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_sc_demog_lookup_path.md)
  : Social Care Demographic Lookup File Path
- [`get_sc_at_episodes_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_sc_at_episodes_path.md)
  : Alarms and Telecare Episodes File Path
- [`get_sc_ch_episodes_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_sc_ch_episodes_path.md)
  : Care Home Episodes File Path
- [`get_sc_hc_episodes_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_sc_hc_episodes_path.md)
  : Home Care Episodes File Path

  : Clean individual file

  : Check if chi is in a file

  : Process Episode file tests

  : Process Individual file tests

  : Read development SLF files (using SLFhelper)
- [`read_file()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/read_file.md)
  : Read a file
- [`write_file()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/write_file.md)
  : Write a data to a file
- [`console_output_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/console_output_path.md)
  : console output path
- [`get_combined_slf_deaths_lookup_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_combined_slf_deaths_lookup_path.md)
  : SLF death dates File Path
- [`get_dummy_boxi_extract_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_dummy_boxi_extract_path.md)
  : Get a path to a dummy file
- [`get_sandpit_extract_path()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_sandpit_extract_path.md)
  : Sandpit Extract File Path

## Read extracts

Process SLF Extracts

- [`read_dev_slf_file()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/read_dev_slf_file.md)
  : Read development SLF files (using SLFhelper)
- [`read_extract_acute()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/read_extract_acute.md)
  : Read Acute extract
- [`read_extract_ae()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/read_extract_ae.md)
  : Read A&E extract
- [`read_extract_cmh()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/read_extract_cmh.md)
  : Read CMH extract
- [`read_extract_delayed_discharges()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/read_extract_delayed_discharges.md)
  : Read Delayed Discharges extract

  : Read district nursing extract

  : Process the GP OoH extract

  : Read Homelessness extract

  : Read Maternity extract
- [`read_extract_mental_health()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/read_extract_mental_health.md)
  : Read Mental Health extract
- [`read_extract_nrs_deaths()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/read_extract_nrs_deaths.md)
  : Read NRS Deaths extract
- [`read_extract_ooh_consultations()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/read_extract_ooh_consultations.md)
  : Read GP OOH Consultations extract
- [`read_extract_ooh_diagnosis()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/read_extract_ooh_diagnosis.md)
  : Read GP OOH Diagnosis extract

  : Read GP OOH Outcomes extract
- [`read_extract_outpatients()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/read_extract_outpatients.md)
  : Read Outpatients extract
- [`read_extract_prescribing()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/read_extract_prescribing.md)
  : Read Prescribing extract
- [`read_file()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/read_file.md)
  : Read a file
- [`read_it_chi_deaths()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/read_it_chi_deaths.md)
  : Read the CHI deaths extract
- [`read_lookup_ltc()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/read_lookup_ltc.md)
  : Read LTC IT extract
- [`read_lookup_sc_client()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/read_lookup_sc_client.md)
  : Process the social care client lookup
- [`read_lookup_sc_demographics()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/read_lookup_sc_demographics.md)
  : Read SC demographics
- [`read_sc_all_alarms_telecare()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/read_sc_all_alarms_telecare.md)
  : Read Social Care Alarms Telecare data
- [`read_sc_all_care_home()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/read_sc_all_care_home.md)
  : Read Social Care - Care Home data
- [`read_sc_all_home_care()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/read_sc_all_home_care.md)
  : Read Social Care Home Care data
- [`read_sc_all_sds()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/read_sc_all_sds.md)
  : Read Social Care SDS data
- [`read_temp_data()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/read_temp_data.md)
  : Read a temp data from disk for debugging purpose
- [`get_gpprac_opendata()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_gpprac_opendata.md)
  : GP Practice details from PHS open data

## Process extracts

Process SLF Extracts

- [`create_homelessness_lookup()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/create_homelessness_lookup.md)
  : Create a homelessness lookup
- [`process_extract_acute()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/process_extract_acute.md)
  : Process the Acute extract
- [`process_extract_ae()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/process_extract_ae.md)
  : Process the A&E extract
- [`process_extract_alarms_telecare()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/process_extract_alarms_telecare.md)
  : Process the (year specific) Alarms Telecare extract
- [`process_extract_care_home()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/process_extract_care_home.md)
  : Process the (year specific) Care Home extract
- [`process_extract_cmh()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/process_extract_cmh.md)
  : Process the Community Mental Health (CMH) extract
- [`process_extract_delayed_discharges()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/process_extract_delayed_discharges.md)
  : Process the delayed discharges extract
- [`process_extract_district_nursing()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/process_extract_district_nursing.md)
  : Process the District Nursing extract
- [`process_extract_gp_ooh()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/process_extract_gp_ooh.md)
  : Process the GP OoH extract
- [`process_extract_home_care()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/process_extract_home_care.md)
  : Process the (year specific) Home Care extract
- [`process_extract_homelessness()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/process_extract_homelessness.md)
  : Process the Homelessness Extract
- [`process_extract_maternity()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/process_extract_maternity.md)
  : Process the maternity extract
- [`process_extract_mental_health()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/process_extract_mental_health.md)
  : Process the mental health extract

  : Process the Outpatients extract

  : Process the prescribing extract

- [`process_tests_sds()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/process_tests_sds.md)
  : Process SDS tests

## Episode file

Building the episode file

- [`add_activity_after_death_flag()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/add_activity_after_death_flag.md)
  : Match on BOXI NRS death dates to process activity after death flag
- [`add_homelessness_flag()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/add_homelessness_flag.md)
  : Add 'homelessness in FY' flag
- [`add_nsu_cohort()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/add_nsu_cohort.md)
  : Add NSU cohort to working file
- [`add_ppa_flag()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/add_ppa_flag.md)
  : Add Potentially Preventable Admission (PPA) Marker
- [`correct_cij_vars()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/correct_cij_vars.md)
  : Correct the CIJ variables
- [`create_cohort_lookups()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/create_cohort_lookups.md)
  : Create the cohort lookups
- [`create_cost_inc_dna()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/create_cost_inc_dna.md)
  : Create cost total net inc DNA
- [`fill_missing_cij_markers()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/fill_missing_cij_markers.md)
  : Fill any missing CIJ markers for records that should have them
- [`link_delayed_discharge_eps()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/link_delayed_discharge_eps.md)
  : Link Delayed Discharge to WIP episode file
- [`fill_geographies()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/fill_geographies.md)
  : Fill postcode and GP practice geographies

## Individual file

- [`add_acute_columns()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/add_acute_columns.md)
  : Add Acute columns

  : Add AE columns

  : Add all columns

  : Add AT columns

  : Add CH columns

  : Add CIJ-related columns

  : Add DD columns

  : Add GLS columns

  : Add HC columns

  : Add HL1 columns

  : Add HRI variables to an SLF Individual File

  : Add columns based on IPDC

  : Add keep_popluation flag

  : Add Mat columns

  : Add MH columns

  : Add NRS columns

  : Add NSU columns

  : Add OoH columns

  : Add OP columns

  : Add PIS columns

  : Add SDS columns

  : Add standard columns

  : Aggregate Care Home episodes to ch_cis

  : Clean up CH
- [`condition_cols()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/condition_cols.md)
  : Condition columns

  : Create the Source Individual file

  : Recode gender

  : Remove blank CHI

  : Calculate cost for Maternity records
- [`calculate_multiple_emergency_cost()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/calculate_multiple_emergency_cost.md)
  : Calculate multiple emergency cost
- [`calculate_outpatient_costs()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/calculate_outpatient_costs.md)
  : Calculate cost for Outpatient records
- [`calculate_prescribing_cost()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/calculate_prescribing_cost.md)
  : Calculate cost for Prescribing records
- [`calculate_psychiatry_cost()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/calculate_psychiatry_cost.md)
  : Calculate cost for Psychiatry records
- [`calculate_residential_care_cost()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/calculate_residential_care_cost.md)
  : Calculate residential care cost
- [`calculate_routine_daycase_cost()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/calculate_routine_daycase_cost.md)
  : Calculate routine daycase cost
- [`calculate_single_emergency_cost()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/calculate_single_emergency_cost.md)
  : Calculate single emergency cost
- [`create_demographic_cohorts()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/create_demographic_cohorts.md)
  : Create the Demographic Cohort lookup
- [`create_service_use_cohorts()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/create_service_use_cohorts.md)
  : Create the Service Use Cohort lookup
- [`recalculate_elective_inpatient_cost()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/recalculate_elective_inpatient_cost.md)
  : Recalculate elective inpatient costs
- [`join_sparra_hhg()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/join_sparra_hhg.md)
  : Join SPARRA and HHG
- [`join_cohort_lookups()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/join_cohort_lookups.md)
  : Join cohort lookups
- [`join_deaths_data()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/join_deaths_data.md)
  : Join Deaths data
- [`join_slf_lookup_vars()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/join_slf_lookup_vars.md)
  : Join slf lookup variables
- [`match_on_ltcs()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/match_on_ltcs.md)
  : Match on LTC DoB and dates of LTC incidence
- [`order_indiv_cols()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/order_indiv_cols.md)
  : Order SLF Individual File Columns

## Demographics

Things related to demographic lookups

- [`fill_geographies()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/fill_geographies.md)
  : Fill postcode and GP practice geographies
- [`get_gpprac_opendata()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_gpprac_opendata.md)
  : GP Practice details from PHS open data
- [`make_gpprac_lookup()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/make_gpprac_lookup.md)
  : Make a GP practice lookup for filling to most recent postcodes based
  on CHI
- [`make_postcode_lookup()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/make_postcode_lookup.md)
  : Make a postcode lookup for filling to most recent postcodes based on
  CHI
- [`recode_health_boards()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/recode_health_boards.md)
  : Recode Health Board code to 2018 standard
- [`recode_hscp()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/recode_hscp.md)
  : Recode HSCP code to 2018 standard
- [`get_la_code_opendata_lookup()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/get_la_code_opendata_lookup.md)
  : Download the LA code lookup
- [`rename_hscp()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/rename_hscp.md)
  : Rename hscp where applicable for testing

## Miscellaneous functions

Miscellaneous functions.

### Homelessness

- [`fix_east_ayrshire_duplicates()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/fix_east_ayrshire_duplicates.md)
  : Fix the East Ayrshire duplicates - Homelessness
- [`fix_west_dun_duplicates()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/fix_west_dun_duplicates.md)
  : Fix the West Dunbartonshire duplicates - Homelessness
- [`produce_homelessness_completeness()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/produce_homelessness_completeness.md)
  : Produce the Homelessness Completeness lookup
- [`fix_scid_renfrewshire()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/fix_scid_renfrewshire.md)
  : Fix social care id in renfrewshire

### Helper functions

- [`vars_end_with()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/vars_select.md)
  [`vars_start_with()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/vars_select.md)
  [`vars_contain()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/vars_select.md)
  : Select columns according to a pattern
- [`max_no_inf()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/max_no_inf.md)
  : Custom maximum
- [`min_no_inf()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/min_no_inf.md)
  : Custom minimum
- [`setup_keyring()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/setup_keyring.md)
  : Interactively set up the keyring

## Linkage utilities

Functions to extract and link data

- [`extract_ep_ind_time()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/extract_ep_ind_time.md)
  : Extract time stamp and time consumption of ep or ind files
- [`extract_targets_time()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/extract_targets_time.md)
  : Extract time stamp and time consumption of targets console output
- [`link_ch_with_adms()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/link_ch_with_adms.md)
  : Link AE episodes released from CH
- [`update_uk_postcode_directory()`](https://public-health-scotland.github.io/source-linkage-files/reference/update_uk_postcode_directory.md)
  : Update UK postcode directory from ONS API The ONS NHSPD directory is
  update quarterly.
